refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This object owns all project objects and is responsable for loading and saving the glade document, you can monitor the project state via this object and its signals.

refsect2.title: glade_project_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GladeProject.

listitem.simpara: a new GladeProject

refsect2.title: glade_project_load ()

TRUE on success, FALSE on failure

Note that when removing the GObject from the project we don't change ->project in the associated GladeWidget; this way UNDO can work.

refsect2.title: glade_project_set_resource ()
refsect2.para: Adds/Modifies/Removes a resource from a project; any project resources will be copied when using "Save As...", when moving widgets across projects and will be copied into the project's directory when selected.

listitem.simpara: A GladeProject
The GladeProperty this resource is required by
The resource file basename to be found in the same directory as the glade file.
A GladeProject

A newly allocated GList of file basenames of resources in this project, note that the strings are not allocated and are unsafe to use once the projects state changes. The returned list should be freed with g_list_free.
The GladeProject.
The resource basename
A newly allocated string holding the full path the the project resource.
A GladeProject
Whether the project is being loaded or not

refsect2.title: The "has-selection" property
refsect2.para: Whether project has a selection.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "modified" property
refsect2.para: Whether project has been modified since it was last saved.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "path" property
refsect2.para: The filesystem path of the project.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "read-only" property
refsect2.para: Whether project is read only or not.
Default value: FALSE
